00039 #include "SendStatus.hpp"
00040 
00041 #include <string>
00042 
00043 using namespace std;
00044 
00045 namespace RTT {
00046     std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, SendStatus fs)
00047     {
00048         switch (fs) {
00049         case SendFailure:
00050             os << "SendFailure";
00051             break;
00052         case SendNotReady:
00053             os << "SendNotReady";
00054             break;
00055         case SendSuccess:
00056             os << "SendSuccess";
00057             break;
00058         default:
00059             os << "InvalidSendStatus";
00060         }
00061         return os;
00062     }
00063 
00064     std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, SendStatus& fs)
00065     {
00066         // default:
00067         fs = SendFailure;
00068         std::string s;
00069         is >> s;
00070         if (s == "SendNotReady")
00071             fs = SendNotReady;
00072         else if (s == "SendSuccess")
00073             fs = SendSuccess;
00074 
00075         return is;
00076     }
00077 }
